v.v: Now they sin more and more.
So they will be like the morning clouds,
But I am Yahweh your God from the land of Egypt.
I knew you in the wilderness,
When you had pasture, then you became full;
I will become like a lion to them;
I will attack them as a bear that is robbed of her cubs.
I gave you a king in my anger,
Ephraim’s iniquity has been stored up;
Pains of childbirth will come on him,
Will I rescue them from the hand of Sheol?
Though Ephraim is prosperous among his brothers,

v: He exalted himself in Israel,
but he became guilty because of Baal worship, and he died.
They make cast metal figures from their silver,
idols as skillfully worked as possible,
all of them the work of the craftsmen.
People say of them,
‘These men who sacrifice kiss calves.’
like the dew that goes away early,
like the chaff that is driven by the wind away from a threshing floor,
and like smoke out of a chimney.
You must acknowledge no God but me;
you must acknowledge that besides me, there is no other Savior.
in the land of great dryness.
and when you were filled, your heart became lifted up.
For that reason you forgot me.
like a leopard I will watch along the path.
I will rip open their chests,
and there I will devour them as a lion,
as a wild beast would tear them to pieces.
who will be able to help you?
that he may save you in all your cities?
Where are your rulers, about whom you said to me,
‘Give me a king and princes’?
and I took him away in my wrath.
his guilt has been stored up.
but he is an unwise son,
for when it is time to be born, he does not come out of the womb.
Will I rescue them from death?
Where, death, are your plagues?
Where, Sheol, is your destruction?
Compassion is hidden from my eyes.”
an east wind will come;
the wind of Yahweh will blow in from the wilderness.
Ephraim’s spring will dry up,
and his well will have no water.
His enemy will plunder his storehouse of every precious object.
for she has rebelled against her God.
They will fall by the sword;
their young children will be dashed to pieces,
and their pregnant women will be ripped open.
